card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NCannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while you have 2 or more monsters in your GY with the same original Type and Attribute, but different names. You can banish 2 monsters from your GY with the same original Type and Attribute, but different names, then target 1 card on the field; send it to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Virtual World Beast - Jiujiu" once per turn.
